overview: Poor Lisa Newman: Her parents think she needs to unwind sexually, so they enroll her in the notorious Dr. Shrinkman's Patented Sex Therapy Clinic. There, our sex hungry, but uptight heroine gets down and dirty with boisterous and buxom nurse, Saphos; gets a handle on the well hung Puerto Rican janitor's broomstick; and subjects herself to a wild grope therapy session from the Doc and his bevy of wigged-out nurses. Boasting some of the wackiest characters and stylishly-lensed sex, 'Mad About You' will tickle your funny bone and turn you on like no other adult film this year. So what are you waiting for?
tagline: Porsche Lynn in about nuts in Mad About you
title: Mad about You
